titles.title: No American Climate Corps Act
No American Climate Corps Act
To prohibit Federal funds from being made available for the Justice40 Initiative or for the American Climate Corps.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Education and the Workforce, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Education and the Workforce, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Manufacturing, and Critical Materials.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
